data.name: PageTitle
data.value: Solution Design

data.name: Step1_Title
data.value: You come to us with your business idea and IT-strategy insights.

data.name: Step1_Point1
data.value: Review your high-level strategy to align technical scope with business goals

data.name: Step1_Point2
data.value: Gather existing documentation, user personas, and success metrics

data.name: Step1_Point3
data.value: Host a kickoff workshop with stakeholders to clarify assumptions

data.name: Step1_Point4
data.value: Define project constraints: budget, timeline, compliance requirements

data.name: Step2_Title
data.value: We analyze every module and write a technical description.

data.name: Step2_Point1
data.value: Break down the solution into functional domains and microservices

data.name: Step2_Point2
data.value: Draft data models, API contracts, and user-flow diagrams

data.name: Step2_Point3
data.value: Specify tech stack choices (frontend, backend, database, messaging)

data.name: Step2_Point4
data.value: Document non-functional requirements: performance, security, scalability

data.name: Step3_Title
data.value: We create a delivery pipeline.

data.name: Step3_Point1
data.value: Design CI/CD workflows for build, test, and deployment stages

data.name: Step3_Point2
data.value: Integrate static code analysis, unit testing, and security scans

data.name: Step3_Point3
data.value: Configure artifact repositories and container registries

data.name: Step3_Point4
data.value: Set up automated rollback and monitoring hooks

data.name: Step4_Title
data.value: We define every single task needed for the final result.

data.name: Step4_Point1
data.value: Translate technical specs into actionable user stories or tasks

data.name: Step4_Point2
data.value: Estimate effort and assign priority (MoSCoW / story points)

data.name: Step4_Point3
data.value: Organize tasks into sprints or milestones

data.name: Step4_Point4
data.value: Prepare acceptance criteria and test scenarios for each item

data.name: Step5_Title
data.value: We hand off all designs in your tool of choice (Jira, Trello, Azure DevOps, etc.).

data.name: Step5_Point1
data.value: Populate boards with epics, stories, and sub-tasks

data.name: Step5_Point2
data.value: Attach wireframes, sequence diagrams, and API spec docs

data.name: Step5_Point3
data.value: Configure workflows, labels, swimlanes, and permission schemes

data.name: Step5_Point4
data.value: Ensure handoff includes a walkthrough and knowledge-transfer session
